transcript: I'll just tell you how I see the whole AI thing tools have existed for a long time computer gets invented guy plus computer does more than guy without computer but as long as it is people versus people high Achievers will always have a way to win the moment that it's humans against machines none of it matters basically until Terminator comes out it's still the same game and worrying about what's going to happen when you no longer have control just feel silly to me we're basically just all rolling a dice as a species and we'll see what happens but in the meantime we do what we've always done we can be
